metadata.title: SNGPL disconnects 3 more metres, checks 60 metres

content.article_body: MULTAN, Jul 31 (APP):In a bid to curb gas theft and illegal activities, the Sui Northern Gas Pipelines Limited (SNGPL) UFG Control Task Force intensified its operation and disconnected three more gas meters in various areas of the city. According to details, two metres were disconnected over using compressor for getting gas illegally. One metre was removed over use for commercial purposes. The door-to-door of 60 consumers was carried out.
